sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Bulgarian: Военният вик за справедливост беше навсякъде - много за огорчането на властите.
backtrans: The military shout of justice was everywhere - much for the bitterness of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Bulgarian: Решението на режима адумбатира основния дневен ред.
backtrans: The decision of the regime adumbates the basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Bulgarian: Общността беше нетърпелива за преминаването на много необходимите реформи.
backtrans: The Community was impatient for the transition of many necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Bulgarian: Think Tank публикува документ, очертаващ тяхното извинение на смъртното наказание.
backtrans: Think Tank published a document outlining their excuse to the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Bulgarian: Овес беше оставен от валидността на петицията
backtrans: Oats was left of the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Bulgarian: Президентът увещаваше министрите си да се измъкнат, докато ключовата опозиционна подкрепа за неговия икономически план беше да се закотжа.
backtrans: The president exhorted his ministers to escape, while the key opposition support for his economic plan was to be anchored.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Bulgarian: Избирателите бяха разкъсани, за да видят сметката.
backtrans: Voters were torn to see the account.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Bulgarian: Дискурсивният разказ на адвоката поклаща журито.
backtrans: The discursive narrative of the lawyer shook the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Bulgarian: Блокът на ЕС се противопостави на евентуално налагане на антидъмпингови мерки.
backtrans: The EU block opposes the possible imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Bulgarian: Агенцията за икономиката на GIG реши да украси възстановяванията!
backtrans: The GIG economy agency decided to decorate the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Bulgarian: Членовете на антиасочетното революционно движение свалиха връстниците в сила!
backtrans: Members of the anti-academic revolutionary movement removed peers into force!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Bulgarian: Предателите разочароващо решават да се борят с колонистите.
backtrans: Traitors disappointingly decide to fight the colonists.
